doc.title: Hidden Treasure
doc.plot: Hope lives in a abusive house with just her dad Sam. She awakes each day with fear and discomfort with the only joy in her life been her best friend Mary. While at Hope's room working on school material the girls get engaged in a minor, but play confrontation. Hope take's this playful act into Sam's room where it escalates into a threat. The threat leads to the accidental finding of a locked box inside a hollow book. Hope's curious nature leads to investigate the box and what it contains. What she discovers will change her life for ever. What is in this box, and what does it hold?
